name: aiopt
description: Pre-deploy LLM cost accident guardrail (local CLI + CI)

scripts.test:npx: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; root="$(pwd)"; tmp="$(mktemp -d)"; echo "tmp=$tmp"; cd "$tmp"; npm pack --silent "$root" >/dev/null; tgz="$(ls -1 aiopt-*.tgz | tail -n 1)"; echo "tgz=$tgz"; npx --yes "./$tgz" install --force; npx --yes "./$tgz" doctor; npx --yes "./$tgz" scan; test -f ./aiopt-output/report.md; echo OK'
scripts.test:npx:keep: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; root="$(pwd)"; tmp="$(mktemp -d)"; echo "tmp=$tmp"; cd "$tmp"; npm pack --silent "$root" >/dev/null; tgz="$(ls -1 aiopt-*.tgz | tail -n 1)"; echo "tgz=$tgz"; npx --yes "./$tgz" install --force; npx --yes "./$tgz" doctor; npx --yes "./$tgz" scan; test -f ./aiopt-output/report.md; echo "OK (kept at $tmp)"'
